text:
Hello! We are a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization where we meet the needs of Public health advocacy and student training. Our workforce development NPO connects students to the services and training they need to find paying careers.

I could really use some help in the e-mail newsletters. For some reason there is a pretty good gap between our first coded module on the right side, before it had leveled with the left side, HubSpot support can't figure it out either. =( Any help is deeply appreciated!
Is this a drag and drop email or a custom coded one?

Hi dearest, I figured out it was just a color mishap, so far the coding has been solid, thankful to HubSpot and this little community!! If you have any interest working with our team, would love to connect and see how we can mutually benefit!
No problem! Feel free to DM me Cynthia :)
